titleStmt.title: Two essays sent in a letter from Oxford to a nobleman in London the first concerning some errors about the creation, general flood, and the peopling of the world : in two parts : the second concerning the rise, progress, and destruction of fables and romances, with the state of learning / by L.P., Master of Arts.
titleStmt.author: L. P., Master of Arts.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and are to be sold by R. Baldwin ...,
